stylesheets.main_app: QWidget {{ background-color: {background}; color: {on_background}; font-family: '{default_font_family}'; }} QLabel {{ color: {on_surface}; margin-bottom: 6px; font-weight: 500; }} QLabel#TrackedTitleLabel, QLabel#SearchTitleLabel {{ color: {on_background}; }} QLineEdit {{ border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; padding: 0px; font-size: 15px; background-color: {surface}; color: {on_surface}; }} QLineEdit:focus {{ border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; padding: 0px; }} QPushButton {{ background-color: transparent; color: #FFFFFF; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; padding: 0px; font-size: 15px; font-weight: 500; outline: none; }} QPushButton:hover {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QPushButton:pressed {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }} QPushButton:disabled {{ background-color: #333333; color: #888888; border: 2px solid #555555; }} QPushButton#AddRunButton {{ background-color: {add_run_button_bg}; color: #FFFFFF; border: 2px solid {add_run_button_bg}; padding: 0px; font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; outline: none; }} QPushButton#AddRunButton:hover {{ background-color: {add_run_button_hover_bg}; }} QPushButton#AddRunButton:pressed {{ background-color: {add_run_button_pressed_bg}; }} QPushButton#AddRunButton:disabled {{ background-color: {add_run_button_disabled_bg}; border: 2px solid {add_run_button_disabled_border}; color: {add_run_button_disabled_text}; }} QPushButton#HamburgerButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; padding: 0; }} QPushButton#HamburgerButton:hover {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QPushButton#HamburgerButton:pressed {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }} QListWidget {{ border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; background-color: {surface}; padding: 0px; font-size: {base_item_font_size}px; selection-background-color: #333333; selection-color: {highlighted_text}; outline: none; color: {on_surface}; }} QListWidget::item {{ padding: 0px; border-bottom: 2px solid {outline_variant}; color: {on_surface}; min-height: 20px; }} QListWidget::item:last-child {{ border-bottom: none; }} QListWidget::item:selected {{ background-color: transparent; color: {highlighted_text}; }} QListWidget::item:hover {{ background-color: transparent; color: #1E90FF; }} QScrollBar:vertical {{ border: none; background: #000000; width: 8px; margin: 0px; }} QScrollBar::handle:vertical {{ background: #FFFFFF; min-height: 25px; }} QScrollBar::add-line:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-line:vertical {{ height: 0px; width: 0px; }} QScrollBar::add-page:vertical, QScrollBar::sub-page:vertical {{ background: none; }} QScrollBar:horizontal {{ border: none; background: none; height: 0px; width: 0px; }} QScrollBar::handle:horizontal {{ background: none; }} QScrollBar::add-line:horizontal, QScrollBar::sub-line:horizontal {{ width: 0px; height: 0px; }} QScrollBar::add-page:horizontal, QScrollBar::sub-page:horizontal {{ background: none; }} QScrollArea {{ border: none; }} QComboBox {{ border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; padding: 5px; font-size: 12px; background-color: {surface}; color: {on_surface}; selection-background-color: {highlight}; selection-color: {highlighted_text}; }} QComboBox::drop-down {{ border: none; }} QComboBox::down-arrow {{ image: url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABAAAAAQCAYAAAAf8/9hAAAAAXNSR0IArs4c6QAAADhJREFUOE9jZGBgYOAdg0h8z2bWf6f2/2c/AwMDUyqjHhAx2gNqQ0h+Dmgd+1iH0BpC9jNQBwAx+go3QvC16QAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==); width: 12px; height: 12px; }} QComboBox QAbstractItemView {{ border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; background-color: {surface}; selection-background-color: {highlight}; selection-color: {highlighted_text}; font-size: 12px; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButton, QPushButton#TimeButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; font-weight: normal; text-align: left; color: #FFFFFF; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButton:hover {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButton:pressed {{ color: #BBBBBB; }} QPushButton#GameLinkButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; padding: 0px; margin: 0; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF; vertical-align: middle; }} QPushButton#GameLinkButton:hover {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#GameLinkButton:pressed {{ color: #BBBBBB; }} QLabel.info_label {{ font-size: {base_item_font_size}px; color: #FFFFFF; text-align: left; padding: 0; margin: 0; }} QPushButton#MoreRunnersButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 0; margin: 0; font-weight: normal; text-align: left; }} QPushButton#MoreRunnersButton:hover {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#MoreRuntersButton:pressed {{ color: #BBBBBB; }} QLabel.dot_separator {{ font-weight: bold; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 0; margin: 0; }} QLabel#DateLabel {{ color: #FFFFFF; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; }} QMenu {{ background-color: #000000; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 5px; }} QMenu::item {{ padding: 8px 12px; background-color: transparent; }} QMenu::item:selected {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QMenu::separator {{ height: 1px; background-color: #FFFFFF; margin: 5px 0px; }} QFrame#GameFrame {{ border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; background-color: {background}; margin-bottom: 10px; padding: 0px; }} QPushButton#OptionsButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; border-radius: 18px; color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: bold; font-size: {options_button_font_size}px; min-width: {options_button_size}px; max-width: {options_button_size}px; min-height: {options_button_size}px; max-height: {options_button_size}px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; }} QPushButton#OptionsButton:hover {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QPushButton#OptionsButton:pressed {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }} QLabel#category_name_label {{ }}
stylesheets.dialog: QDialog {{ background-color: {background}; color: {on_background}; }} QLabel {{ font-size: 16px; color: {on_background}; }} QTableWidget {{ background-color: {background}; alternate-background-color: {background}; color: {on_background}; border: 2px solid {outline}; gridline-color: {outline}; }} QTableWidget::item {{ color: {on_background}; background-color: {background}; font-size: 12px; padding: 5px; }} QTableWidget::item:selected {{ background-color: {background}; color: {on_background}; }} QPushButton {{ background-color: transparent; color: #FFFFFF; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; font-size: 15px; }} QPushButton:hover {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QPushButton:pressed {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }} QScrollBar:vertical {{ background: #000000; width: 8px; }} QScrollBar::handle:vertical {{ background: #FFFFFF; min-height: 20px; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButtonInTable, QPushButton#TimeLinkButtonInTable, QPushButton#MoreRunnersButtonInTable {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; font-weight: normal; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF; font-size: 12px; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButtonInTable:hover, QPushButton#TimeLinkButtonInTable:hover, QPushButton#MoreRunnersButtonInTable:hover {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButtonInTable:pressed, QPushButton#TimeLinkButtonInTable:pressed, QPushButton#MoreRunnersButtonInTable:pressed {{ color: #BBBBBB; }} QLabel#dot_separator_table {{ margin-top: 3px; }}
stylesheets.last_record_entry: QWidget {{ background-color: #000000; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; }} QLabel {{ font-size: 13px; color: #FFFFFF; margin-bottom: 0px; font-weight: normal; border: none; }} QLabel.record_detail_label {{ font-size: 13px; color: #FFFFFF; margin-bottom: 0px; border: none; }} QPushButton#RecordLinkButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 5px 10px; margin: 0; font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; text-align: center; }} QPushButton#RecordLinkButton:hover {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QPushButton#RecordLinkButton:pressed {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }}
stylesheets.all_runs_dialog_header: QHeaderView::section {{ background-color: #000000; color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: bold; font-size: 12px; padding: 5px; text-align: center; border: 2px solid #FFFFFF; border-top: none; border-left: none; }} QHeaderView::section:last-child {{ border-right: 2px solid #FFFFFF; }}
stylesheets.category_item_widget: QWidget {{ background-color: transparent; min-height: {options_button_size}px; }} QLabel {{ font-family: '{default_font_family}'; font-size: {base_item_font_size}px; color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: normal; padding: 0; margin: 0; }} QLabel#new_wr_label {{ font-weight: normal; color: {new_wr_label_text}; font-size: {base_item_font_size}px; }} QLabel.dot_separator {{ font-weight: bold; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 0; margin: 0; }} QLabel#DateLabel {{ color: #FFFFFF; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; }} QPushButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; font-family: '{default_font_family}'; font-size: {base_item_font_size}px; font-weight: normal; text-align: left; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButton {{ font-weight: bold; color: #FFFFFF; border: none; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButton:hover {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#RunnerLinkButton:pressed {{ color: #BBBBBB; }} QPushButton#TimeButton {{ font-weight: normal; color: #FFFFFF; text-align: right; }} QPushButton#TimeButton:hover {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#TimeButton:pressed {{ color: #BBBBBB; }} QPushButton#MoreRunnersButton {{ color: #FFFFFF; }} QPushButton#MoreRunnersButton:hover, QPushButton#MoreRunnersButton:pressed {{ color: #DDDDDD; }} QPushButton#OptionsButton {{ background-color: transparent; border: none; border-radius: 18px; color: #FFFFFF; font-weight: bold; font-size: {options_button_font_size}px; min-width: {options_button_size}px; max-width: {options_button_size}px; min-height: {options_button_size}px; max-height: {options_button_size}px; padding: 0px; text-align: center; }} QPushButton#OptionsButton:hover {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); }} QPushButton#OptionsButton:pressed {{ background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); }}
